description: An excel spreadsheet containing housing characteristic data for all Boston neighborhoods from the American Community Survey 2005-2009. The data in this spreadsheet were used to create the ACS neighborhood reports.

name: Housing Characteristics, all neighborhoods: American Community Survey 2005-2009
